definition[0]: the process of calculating the cost of a future business activity, product etc, or the calculation itself
example[0]: the planning and costing of staffing levels
example[1]: We were asked to prepare detailed costings for the scheme.
definition[1]: the process of calculating the cost of a future activity or product, or the calculation itself
example[2]: Railtrack originally said the scheme would cost £100 million, but last year produced revised costings of £350 million.
